visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a polar column chart with the following specifications: Chart type: Polar column, Chart title: Monthly Sales Data, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark background with white text for labels and titles, Data series: Monthly sales data for a year with the series name 'Sales', Custom colors: Use a gradient from blue to green, Additional configurations: Set chart margins to 50px, add a legend at the bottom, and set the background color to #2c3e50.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a polar column chart with a dark background and white text for labels and titles. The chart displays monthly sales data for a year, with the series named 'Sales'. The data points are represented using a gradient color from blue to green. Additional configurations include setting the chart margins to 50px, positioning the legend at the bottom, and setting the background color to a dark shade (#2c3e50). This setup ensures a visually appealing and informative chart that meets the specified requirements.
